author: udais
title: Ada Pay Plug-In
description:
e-commerce websites does not use crypto as payment
Integration require special technical skills
Payment flow is unclear and complicated

author: volibra
title: Shopify Plugin: Accept Ada in Store
description: Lack of Cardano-based shopify extension for merchants to accept Ada payment in their store

author: henokp50
title: Crowdfunding Platform with ADA
description: Lack of crowdfunding portal to raise capital for startups in Africa.

author: ductiger
title: cPAY - TrustOrder Anti SpamOrder
description: There is no simple enough plugin which non-technical users can use to integrate with their website then protect sellers from spam orders

author: johnathan.lopez.a
title: WebApp: NodeJs COTI:ADA PaymentApp
description: Development of an app that helps to integrate real time with COTI-ADA Pay API. This makes effective the send/receive ADA from WebApps & API.

author: rodolfo.miranda
title: Odoo plugin
description: Open source Odoo platform with millions of users don't accept payments in ADA

author: rodolfo.miranda
title: Vending Machine (MDB) interface
description: Vending machines don't accept payments in ADA

author: profd2004
title: Opensource PHP SDK for COTI ADA Pay
description: PHP is used by over 75% of all the websites but there is no high quality Cardano native SDK for supporting ADA Payment.

author: advitha
title: Konma WEB3 payment Solution
description: The ecosystem lacks a functional crypto payment system for an ADA payment gateway in e-commerce websites.

author: mamazoe
title: RAEDA
description: MOBILITY- one of the oldest and most pressing issues of an average African.

author: geekship
title: SOIL: E-Commerce
description: Getting started with crypto commerce is hard :)

author: nftdao
title: One-Click ₳ Pay
description: ₳ Pay market penetration requires simple to use and integrate design patterns aimed at their target small to medium ecommerce platforms.

author: matthiasksieber
title: Case Study: Yomi.ai & Ada Pay
description: There are no clear incentives for established small business owners to accept ADA as payment.

author: abehazbunjr
title: Tokenized Products for Shopify
description: Shopify and Woocommerce are major e-commerce platforms with no ability to utilize native tokens as utility, login or sale items.

author: ravetrade
title: Affiliate e-Comm Plugin
description: Reduce cost, payout delay for affiliate marketers. High fiat transfer fees, delayed payout cost $500 million pa.

author: carlhenryglobal
title: ADA Payments for Joomla 3 & 4
description: The Joomla Extension Directory does not offer a Cardano ADA Payment option for popular Shopping Carts.
